meanings.sent1: The children played cooperatively in the sandbox.
meanings.sent2: The team members worked cooperatively to finish the project on time.
meanings.sent3: The ants cooperatively carried the food back to their nest.
meanings.sent4: The birds chirped cooperatively as if in perfect harmony.
meanings.sent5: The students sang cooperatively in the school choir, creating beautiful music together.

meanings.definition: In a way that involves working together with others
meanings.sent1: The friends painted cooperatively on the large canvas.
meanings.sent2: The community members cleaned up the park cooperatively.
meanings.sent3: The robots cooperatively assembled the parts in the factory.
meanings.sent4: The dancers moved cooperatively across the stage, showcasing their unity.
meanings.sent5: The athletes trained cooperatively to improve their performance as a team.

meanings.sent1: She completed the project cooperatively with her classmates.
meanings.sent2: The scientists conducted the research cooperatively with international partners.
meanings.sent3: The chefs cooked cooperatively in the kitchen, creating a delicious meal.
meanings.sent4: The musicians played cooperatively at the concert, captivating the audience.
meanings.sent5: The animals hunted cooperatively, ensuring everyone got their share of the food.
